title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Comments on Admission by Rishi Sunak he Removed Funding from Deprived Areas
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on 5 August 2022.
content:
Proof Rishi Sunak and the Tories deliberately funnelled taxpayers’ money to rich parts of the country.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

If your school is crumbling, your hospital overflowing or your police station closing, remember who’s to blame.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
